text: @PaulKagame @WHO @StateHouseKenya @Macky_Sall @MagufuliJP @Presidence_RDC @CyrilRamaphosa @BorisJohnson @KGeorgieva @NAkufoAddo please we need taps flowing in and around Tema-Ashaiman  in the wake of covid19. How can we wash off the virus without water and how could we drink enough water which also assist in clearing our throats of any pathogens?
